content.question: Consider the graph of the polar function <math alttext="r equals f open parentheses theta close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, where <math alttext="f open parentheses theta close parentheses equals 1 plus 2 sin theta"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mpadded lspace="+1px"><mi>θ</mi></mpadded></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, in the polar coordinate system for <math alttext="0 less or equal than theta less or equal than 2 pi"><semantics><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Which of the following statements is true about the distance between the point with polar coordinates <math alttext="open parentheses f open parentheses theta close parentheses comma theta close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and the origin?

choices.label: ​The distance is increasing for <math alttext="0 less or equal than theta less or equal than pi over 2"><semantics><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>≤</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, because <math alttext="f open parentheses theta close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is positive and increasing on the interval.

​The distance is increasing for <math alttext="fraction numerator 3 pi over denominator 2 end fraction less or equal than theta less or equal than fraction numerator 11 pi over denominator 6 end fraction"><semantics><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>≤</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>≤</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>11</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, because <math alttext="f open parentheses theta close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is negative and increasing on the interval.

​The distance is decreasing for <math alttext="0 less or equal than theta less or equal than pi over 2"><semantics><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>≤</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, because <math alttext="f open parentheses theta close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is positive and decreasing on the interval.

​The distance is decreasing for <math alttext="fraction numerator 3 pi over denominator 2 end fraction less or equal than theta less or equal than fraction numerator 11 pi over denominator 6 end fraction"><semantics><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>≤</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>≤</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>11</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, because <math alttext="f open parentheses theta close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is negative and decreasing on the interval.
